Stanza 1:

veNNai chEdham vandhAl kooda thappikoLLalAm
d  p   d  p    d  p    d  p  d   S p  p p

puLLai chEdham vandhuvittA enna seyvathu
d  p   d  p    d  p  d  p  g p  s  s sg

muLLai kAlil yEtri koNdAl raTHam mattumdhAn 
d  p   d p   d  p  d  p   d S    p  p  p

unnai nenjil yEtri koNdEn niTHam yuTHamthAn
d p   d  p   d  p  d  p   g p    s s   s

solli theerA inbam kaNdu endhan nenju kooTHAda
s  r  g   m  s  r  g  m  s r    g  p  p  dS p

minnal kaNda  thALai pOla unnAl nAnum pooTHAda
s  r   g  mpm s  r   g m  s r   gs p  p  dS p

unnai kaNdEn ennai kANo viNNai kANa unnai nAnum
p d   S  SR  p d   S SR p  d   SGSG G S   d p

(ippavE ippavE)

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)

endhan vAzhvil vandhathendru nalla thiruppam ini
undhan kaiyai pattri koNdE sella viruppam
nenja vayal engum enai nattu vaikkirEn
niTHam adhil kAdhal uram ittu vaikkirEn
unnai kAna nAnum vandhAl sAlai ellAm poonjOlai
unnai neengi pOgum nEram sOlai kooda thAr pAlai

maNNukkuLLE vErai pOla nenjukkuLLE needhAn needhAn

(ippavE ippavE)
